wordpressPost.title: Best 4 Products for Younger Skin!
wordpressPost.content:
Best 4 Products for Younger Skin!

 

 

https://vimeo.com/214932611

 

Hey there! Below I have put the links to the products in the video except for Retin A as that is a prescription you will have to get from your regular doctor and then go to GoodRx.com and buy it there for much less than retail.

You can buy any good sunscreen that is at least SPF 30 or above for your face, neck, and chest.  I like SkinCeuticals and I get it on Amazon.  I like it because it’s a liquid that is skin tone in color and it sets my makeup very well.  I put the link below.

Best 4 Products for Younger Skin!

FYI the links below are affiliate links, and I get a small commission.

Vitamin C serum

http://amzn.to/2oLe1Sr

TNS Stem Cell Recovery Complex

http://amzn.to/2oObtUL

SkinCeuticals Sunscreen

http://amzn.to/2oL9KOS

 

If you seriously want smoother skin then check out my “Smooth Skin” course where I will show you exactly how I get it.  No needles, fillers or surgeons needed here!

https://how-to-get-smoother-skin.teachable.com
